member.name: T:cxPlatform.Client.ConexusBase.HypermediaLinkedAttribute
member.summary: Attribute is used to make HypermediaLinks between DTos. Attribute can be placed at class level. Then the route template is used. Attribute can also be placed at property level on a field that is used to lookup another Dto. The HyperMediaFormatter will try to resolve url if RouteIdField matches the route parameter. If not possible a template will be returned.

member.name: P:cxPlatform.Client.ConexusBase.HypermediaLinkedAttribute.LinkedResourceType
member.summary: Resouretype (Dto-class) that is going to be referenced

member.name: P:cxPlatform.Client.ConexusBase.HypermediaLinkedAttribute.LinkGroupName
member.summary: Links will be grouped. This typically is a archectype or domain

member.name: P:cxPlatform.Client.ConexusBase.HypermediaLinkedAttribute.RouteIdField
member.summary: Property in the class that is a "foreign key" to another resource

member.name: T:cxPlatform.Client.ConexusBase.Latest.HyperMediaCollectionResponse
member.summary: Class returns collection of Links that can be used to navigate Conexus APIs without hardcoding of urls

member.name: P:cxPlatform.Client.ConexusBase.Latest.HyperMediaCollectionResponse.Data
member.summary: Contains the List of Conexus DTOs which again contains the data being returned in service

member.name: P:cxPlatform.Client.ConexusBase.Latest.HyperMediaCollectionResponse.Operations
member.summary: Operations that is possible to perform on the type of data returned in the list

member.name: P:cxPlatform.Client.ConexusBase.Latest.HyperMediaCollectionResponse.Relations
member.summary: Links to other DTOs that have "foreign keys" in the data returned

member.name: P:cxPlatform.Client.ConexusBase.Latest.HyperMediaCollectionResponse.Links
member.summary: Links to other endpoints that are not part of data respons, but could be relevant for client

member.name: T:cxPlatform.Client.ConexusBase.Latest.HyperMediaBatchRequest`1
member.summary: Used as request object to post batch request. They can contain all types of HTTP Verbs in same batch request

member.summary: Convenience method to add a Get request
member.param: Uri of resource to batch. Same as you would use for single GET
Used for controlling which version of Dto/API is returned

Used for controlling which version of API is returned
